page.title: 04A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A CHILD
page.content: A{typical day}for me would be to get up at{7.30a.m. and get washed.}I then have my breakfast of{tea and toast. At {8.15a.m.}I go to the{newsagent}to collect my{newspapers}and then deliver them. I go home and have a{short rest. At 8.30a.m. I collect my{schoolbag}and {badminton racquet. After saying {goodbye}I head for school at{8.40a.m. Arriving at school I put my bag in the line and have a game of{football}for {15 minutes. I spend the morning doing {maths, language and reading. In the {afternoon I either do project work, {music, games, activities, craft or {computer. After school I sometimes go {to clubs, play with my friends or {amuse myself at home.}In the evening I enjoy working with my computer.My favourite computer game is {"WANTED_MONTY MOLE".
